caption.title: Formation mechanism of Co 3O 4/TiO 2 hierarchical heterostructures.
caption.p: SEM images of Co 3O 4/TiO 2 hierarchical heterostructures (before annealing) at various reaction stages by setting the reaction time 1 h (a), 1.5 h (b), 2 h (c), 4 h (d), 6 h (e), and 9 h (f). And schematic of the formation process of Co 3O 4/TiO 2 hierarchical heterostructures (g).
